p: The antimicrobial activity of the essential oil was determined by diffusion and dilution method [20] against 4 gram-positive (Bacillus subtilis, Staphylococcus aureus, Bacillus cereus, Enterococcus faecalis), 6 gram-negative bacteria (Salmonella typhi, E. coli 12079, E. coli 2799, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Salmonella enteritidis, Acetobacter aceti) and 4 fungi (Candida albicans, Aspergillus niger, Sacharomyces cerevaceae and Trichoderma sp.) species.
